start: ^Those frogs are pretty nasty, aren't they? Good to see that you didn't have problems with them!
^I guess my sons gave you some useful tips about moving around, but I'm sure you don't know how to defend yourself.

g-0: ^Not every animal and frog is as calm as those you've met in the cave!

end_loop: ^Sometimes you'll have to protect youself. Press E to hide behind your shield and SHIFT to roll! Oh, and talk to my wife later.
